Welcome to the Ruby User Group Speaker Exchange

We are in the process of setting up the project. A work in progress description of it can be found on google docs.

The following user groups have joined so far:

  • Amsterdam - Netherlands (Josh Kalderimis)
  • Berlin - Germany (Thilo Utke)
  • Edinburgh - Scotland (Paul Wilson)
  • London - UK (Murray Steele)

If you want to support the exchange by sponsoring or participation please join the Google Group.

Recent updates

First Exchange

published June 04, 2011

“The World is a book, and those who do not travel read only a page.” – Saint Augustine

In June Martin Rehfeld, member of the Ruby User Group (Rug::B), will travel over the North Sea to present at the Scottish Ruby User Group in Edinburgh.

Martin Rehfeld will be talking about the lessons learned developing his new service Assets.io. Moving parts involve apart from Cloudfront & EC2 a custom backend using evented Ruby code (Thin/Async Rack/Eventmachine).

The speaker exchange program is looking for some sponsorship, particularly to cover Martinâ€™s cost. If your company can help, get in touch via the Google Group or email thilo $at$ upstre $dot$ am.
